thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: André Fuster

author: André Fuster
title: André Fuster
text: The Homestay.com is different of ever I've seen before . The Homestay is a place where we can stay in a house of a family who lives in your destination, what improve the possibilities of culture, languages and experience exchange! Not like a hotel where you're by yourself. And you can introduce yourself before booking, that's is good for de host family to know who they're accepting to their houses.
